RmActionHandler Class Reference

Provides an interface for any class that wants to act as an action listener within the Pioneer robot Aria event call chain. More...

Public Member Functions

virtual void handleAction (ArRobot *robot)=0
 Override to take some action as part of an RmActionHook event that is installed in the Aria action event call chain.

Detailed Description

Provides an interface for any class that wants to act as an action listener within the Pioneer robot Aria event call chain.

Usage

See RmActionHook for an example of how to utilize the handler.

Dependencies

None.
